title: Rokuhoudou Yotsuiro Biyori
resume: Four men—Gure, Sui, Tokitaka, and Tsubaki—each help run a Japanese tea shop together called Rokuhoudou. When one visits the shop, they are greeted warmly, is served with tea, and are often helped with any problems they may have.

When one visits the shop, they are greeted warmly, is served with tea, and are often helped with any problems they may have.
